content.description: Super fun, pumpy climbing with sometimes awkward moves, but still fun. There are kind of 3 cruxes with rest holds in between. You may want stick clip the first bolt cause the move off the ground is tricky, but only if your into that. Getting through the X in the rock is the first crux. Get up onto the blocks and have a nice shake out before embarking on the finger crack. Once you are through that you have the choice of a awkward move through the roof or a 5.7 ramp to the left.
content.protection: 9 bolts, I think. To a 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: To the right of Kisu's Phat locate and X in the rock under some hanging blocks.

content.description:
This beautiful route climbs strait through the big roof. It is the obvious bolt line that starts out on the right side of a triangle in the rock. (The left side would be a good challenge for some one some day.)

Climb easy face on 4 bolts, then shoot the roof. Mind you, the problem isn't getting through the roof but the overhung part above it.
content.location: Middle right on Cats Claw Crag
